attributes.action: Ensure equal treatment for pre-payment energy customers.
attributes.additional_details: Unlike standard credit and direct debit customers, pre-payment customers pay in advance and face higher energy costs.  Pre-payment customers are forced into a situation where they have no option but to disconnect from their energy supply when they exceed just £10 of debt.  Unlike standard credit and direct debit customers, pre-payment customers pay in advance and do not have the same opportunity to resolve debt issues with their suppliers.
attributes.background: Act to ensure that prepayment energy customers are treated equally to standard credit and direct debit customers; that they pay the same unit rates for energy and standing charges, and are given as much time and support to resolve financial difficulties they may face.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you would like to see changes for those using pre-payment energy meters, but we are unsure exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what measures the Government could take on this issue.

We currently have the following petition open on this topic which you might like to sign:

Stop energy companies charging more for pre payment meter users.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621791
